name: The Squeeze (msdos622wasfun)
description: The Squeeze is a very simple time-wasting kind of game that borrows its essential mechanics from games like Frogger.  All you have to do is climb your green dot to the top of the ladder and avoid the red dots and the outer walls, which slowly close in on you.  You can go up, but not down.  The more agile you are, the more points you earn.  High scores are recorded too.
